T

TokenCardInfo - Class in eu.nets.pia.data.model
 
TokenCardInfo(String, SchemeType, String, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class eu.nets.pia.data.model.TokenCardInfo
Deprecated.
- System authentication becomes obsolete due to PSD2/SCA regulation. Replaced with `TokenCardInfo(tokenId, schemeId, expiryDate, cvcRequired)`
